price: 88. Waana ajiibnnay baryadiisii, kana badbaadinnay murugadii. Sidaasaana u badbaadinnaa mu’miniinta.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajabnā lahu wanajjaynāhu mina al-ghami wakadhālika nunjī al-mu'minīna
